author: Special Correspondent
text:
Minister for Khadi and Village Industries T.P. Poonatchi on Sunday flagged off a rally on the occasion of Road Safety week. He also inaugurated a photo exhibition on the awareness of road safety.

Accompanied by K.S. Palanisamy, the Minister later pasted awareness stickers in buses.

He also distributed pamphlets to the passersby.

R. Manoharan, Chief Government Whip, P. Kumar, Member of Parliament, M. Paranjyoti and C. Valarmathi, Members of Legislative Assembly also took part.

Several programmes have been arranged to create awareness among the public on road safety. The celebrations will continue up to January 16.

Nagapattinam

Exhibition on road safety and awareness rally marked the 27{+t}{+h}road safety week celebrations in Nagapattinam on Sunday.

K.A. Jayapal, Minister for Fisheries, inaugurated the celebrations. Collector S. Palanisamy, Abinov Kumar, Superintendent of Police and others participated in a rally. A large number of people including TNSTC drivers, checking inspectors and Regional Transport Officers took part.
title: Road safety week celebrations
